verbose_text: Expression of PABP1 or PABP1-3E in the PABP1-3 ' UTR RNAi cell line rescued cell proliferation (XREF_FIG), but expression of PABP1-3A in the PABP1-3 ' UTR RNAi cell line resulted in a moderate growth defect (XREF_FIG), indicating that the phosphorylation of PABP1 is important for cell proliferation.
evidence: PABP1-3' UTR RNAi cell line rescued cell proliferation
